snippet: While a court threw out Hosni Mubarak’s conviction for failing to prevent the deaths of protesters, the former Egyptian president is being held for investigation on other charges.
abstract: Egyptian appeals court throws out guilty verdict and life sentence against former Pres Hosni Mubarak on charges that he allowed killing of protesters and orders new trial to investigate other charges against him; many Egyptians see decision as parable of country's fitful progress in its struggle to break free of its autocratic past.
lead_paragraph: While a court threw out Hosni Mubarak’s conviction for failing to prevent the deaths of protesters, the former Egyptian president is being held for investigation on other charges.

headline.main: Egyptian Court Rejects Verdict Against Mubarak
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Court Rejects Verdict Against Mubarak

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
